message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love.
Thanks for the offer, Alice!  I'm definitely interested, but $150 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to come down to $80? That's the absolute most I'm able to spend right now.

I understand that 150 is a bit steep for you, Bob. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer you the product for 110. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll really appreciate the value it brings.
Alice, I appreciate the offer, but $110 is still a bit more than I'm comfortable spending.  How about $90? It's a fair price for both of us, and I'm confident we can make this work.

I understand that you're trying to find a fair price, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go as low as 90. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, and I can offer you the product for 100. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll really appreciate the value it brings.

Alice, I really appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $100 is still a bit too high for me. I'm really serious about getting this product, but my absolute max is $95. If we can agree on that, I'm ready to buy it now.

I understand that you're really close to your budget, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go as low as 95. I'm willing to make one more concession, and I can offer you the product for 105. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll really appreciate the value it brings.
